thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.dialaflight.com
thread.title: juliet

author: juliet
title: juliet
text: Once again Dail a Flight which we have often used came up with the best Quote: for flights to and from and within India. This was quite a complicated trip for 4 people and all the arrangements went without a hitch. At one awful point we thought we would have to cancel the trip because of illness and Luke and his colleagues were so helpful in explaining the implications and options. Fortunately this did not happen. I love it that the phones and emails are always answered promptly
